description: AWSServiceEndpoint store the configuration of a custom url to override existing defaults of AWS Services.

name.description: name is the name of the AWS service. The list of all the service names can be found at https://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-service-information.html This must be provided and cannot be empty.

url.description: url is fully qualified URI with scheme https, that overrides the default generated endpoint for a client. This must be provided and cannot be empty.
